data_table.description: AAA Over-Reader Data Collection Form, Visit 5. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [AAA Over-Reader Data Collection Form, AAO]

variable.name: AAO1
variable.description: Q1. Are the diameters in Q3 of the AAT form correct as reported. Diameters report status [AAA Over-Reader Data Collection Form, AAO]
variable.value: Diameters as reported are completely correct

variable.name: AAO2A
variable.description: Q2a. Enter diameters with correct values. Proximal aorta AP (cm) [AAA Over-Reader Data Collection Form, AAO]

variable.name: AAO2B
variable.description: Q2b. Enter diameters with correct values. Proximal aorta transverse (cm) [AAA Over-Reader Data Collection Form, AAO]

variable.name: AAO2C
variable.description: Q2c. Enter diameters with correct values. Mid aorta AP (cm) [AAA Over-Reader Data Collection Form, AAO]

variable.name: AAO2D
variable.description: Q2d. Enter diameters with correct values. Mid aorta transverse (cm) [AAA Over-Reader Data Collection Form, AAO]

variable.name: AAO2E
variable.description: Q2e. Enter diameters with correct values. Distal aorta AP (cm) [AAA Over-Reader Data Collection Form, AAO]

variable.name: AAO2F
variable.description: Q2f. Enter diameters with correct values. Distal aorta transverse (cm) [AAA Over-Reader Data Collection Form, AAO]

variable.name: AAO2G
variable.description: Q2g. Enter diameters with correct values. Fusiform aneurysm diameter AP (cm) [AAA Over-Reader Data Collection Form, AAO]

variable.name: AAO2H
variable.description: Q2h. Enter diameters with correct values. Fusiform aneurysm diameter transverse (cm) [AAA Over-Reader Data Collection Form, AAO]

variable.name: AAO3A
variable.description: 3a. Other potential abnormalities. Saccular aneurysm AP (cm) [AAA Over-Reader Data Collection Form, AAO]

variable.name: AAO3B
variable.description: Q2a. Enter diameters with correct values. Saccular aneurysm transverse (cm) [AAA Over-Reader Data Collection Form, AAO]

variable.name: AAO4A
variable.description: Q4a. Check all of the following that apply. Alert Result: AAA>=5 cm [AAA Over-Reader Data Collection Form, AAO]

variable.name: AAO4A1
variable.description: Q4a1. Check all of the following that apply. Alert Result: AAA>=5 cm. A pecify location and size of AAA: [AAA Over-Reader Data Collection Form, AAO]

variable.name: AAO4B
variable.description: Q4b. Check all of the following that apply. Alert Result: other abnormality [AAA Over-Reader Data Collection Form, AAO]

variable.name: AAO4B1
variable.description: Q4b1. Check all of the following that apply. Alert Result: other abnormality. The participant scan showed: [AAA Over-Reader Data Collection Form, AAO]

variable.name: AAO4C
variable.description: Q4c. Check all of the following that apply. Abnormal Result: AAA 3-4.9 Cm [AAA Over-Reader Data Collection Form, AAO]

variable.name: AAO4C1
variable.description: Q4c1. Check all of the following that apply. AAA abnormal location and size [AAA Over-Reader Data Collection Form, AAO]

variable.name: AAO4D
variable.description: Q4d. Check all of the following that apply. Abnormal Result: saccular aneurysm [AAA Over-Reader Data Collection Form, AAO]

variable.name: AAO4D1
variable.description: Q4d1. Check all of the following that apply. Abnormal Result: saccular aneurysm. Specify location: [AAA Over-Reader Data Collection Form, AAO]

variable.name: AAO4E
variable.description: Q4e. Check all of the following that apply. Abnormal Result: other clinically relevant abnormality [AAA Over-Reader Data Collection Form, AAO]

variable.name: AAO4E1
variable.description: Q4e1. Check all of the following that apply. Description of other clinically relevant abnormality [AAA Over-Reader Data Collection Form, AAO]

variable.name: AAO4F
variable.description: Q4f. Check all of the following that apply. Normal aorta results [AAA Over-Reader Data Collection Form, AAO]

variable.name: AAO4G
variable.description: Q4g. Check all of the following that apply. Prior intervention. Evidence of aortic aneurysmal surgery [AAA Over-Reader Data Collection Form, AAO]

variable.name: AAO4H
variable.description: Q4h. Check all of the following that apply. Prior intervention. Evidence of aortic stent/angioplasty [AAA Over-Reader Data Collection Form, AAO]

variable.name: AAO5
variable.description: Q5. Aortic Scan Quality [AAA Over-Reader Data Collection Form, AAO]

variable.name: AAO7
variable.description: Q7. Field center handled Alert incorrectly [AAA Over-Reader Data Collection Form, AAO]

variable.name: AAO0AY
variable.description: Year of completion date [AAA Over-Reader Data Collection Form, AAO]
